Docs.param: A readable, seekable stream to load from.
Will contain the input schema for the model. If the model was saved without any description of the input, there will be no input schema. In this case this can be .
Docs.summary: Load the model and its input schema from a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.ML.ITransformer LoadWithDataLoader (System.IO.Stream stream, out Microsoft.ML.IDataLoader<Microsoft.ML.Data.IMultiStreamSource> loader);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.ML.ITransformer LoadWithDataLoader(class System.IO.Stream stream, [out] class Microsoft.ML.IDataLoader`1<class Microsoft.ML.Data.IMultiStreamSource>& loader) cil managed
Public Function LoadWithDataLoader (stream As Stream, ByRef loader As IDataLoader(Of IMultiStreamSource)) As ITransformer
member this.LoadWithDataLoader : System.IO.Stream * IDataLoader -> Microsoft.ML.ITransformer

Docs.param: A readable, seekable stream to load from.

The data loader from the model stream. Note that if there is no data loader, this method will throw an exception. The scenario where no loader is stored in the stream should be handled instead using the method.
Docs.summary: Load a transformer model and a data loader model from a stream.
Docs.returns: The transformer model from the model stream.

Docs.param: The trained model to be saved. Note that this can be , as a shorthand for an empty transformer chain. Upon loading with the returned value will be an empty .
The schema of the input to the transformer. This can be .
A writeable, seekable stream to save to.
Docs.summary: Save a transformer model and the schema of the data that was used to train it to the stream.
